metadata.title: CVE-2018-20453 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The getlong function in numutils.c in libdoc through 2017-10-23 has aheap-based buffer over-read that allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: catdoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
